comment: This mask issue is really a problem. Again, you do not protect yourself against COVID-19 by wearing a mask! The viral particles are too small and the filtration ability of surgical masks is insufficient. Even N-95 masks fail to protect you.1/2

@jeffreyswisher @waltmossberg Agree that ppl should not hoard. However your statement is not accurate. Properly fitted and worn N95 masks do reduce droplet transmission. They may not prevent aerosol transmission, but this has not as been proven. If N95 masks are not effective, God help our healthcare workers
